text: Bengt Edvin Åberg (26 June 1944 – 6 March 2021) was a Swedish professional motocross racer. He competed in the Motocross World Championships from 1966 to 1979. He was a two-time FIM 500cc Motocross World Champion. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Swedish sportspeople Category:Motorcycle racers Category:2021 deaths
title: Bengt Åberg
